ChangeDescriptions.ChangeDescription: Version 2.37: Updated the Source object to provide an 'Initial Number Entities' option for the 'On Event' arrival mode, for creating an initial number of entities at the beginning of the simulation run in addition to entities created by the specified Event Name. Also added a 'Rate Scale Factor' option for the 'Time Varying Arrival Rate' arrival mode, for scaling the arrival rate values specified in the rate table.
Version 2.39: Updated the Source object to provide a 'State Assignments' property category.

Version 2.40: Updated the Source object to provide a 'Table Reference Assignment' property category. In the object process logic, the 'Action' property for all Execute steps executing an 'add-on process' is now specified as 'WaitUntilCompleted'.
Version 2.41: Updated the Source object to provide a 'Stopping Conditions' property category. Updated the assignments repeat groups to take state units into account.
Version 3.42: Changes related to setting the 'Token Associated Object Destroyed Action' option for process logic in this object.
Version 3.47: Renamed 'Table Reference Assignment' property category to 'Table Reference Assignments'. Added new 'Appearance' property category.
Version 3.49: Specified the 'OnAssociatedObjectTransferRequested' property of some processes as 'EndProcess'.

Version 3.54: Conversion to 'OnRunInitialized' standard interface process. Added 'Run Ending' add-on process trigger. For the 'Arrival Table' arrival mode option, added new 'Arrival Time Deviation','No-Show Probability', and 'Repeat Arrival Pattern' features. Also, to support the 'Maximum Time' stopping condition, the Source object's logic now takes advantage of a new 'Maximum Time' feature in the Timer element rather than using a Delay step-based approach.
Version 3.56: For the 'Arrival Table' arrival mode option, added new 'Arrival Events Per Time Slot' feature.
Version 4.58: Added new 'Advanced Options' property category.
Version 4.61: Added new 'Financials' property category.
Version 4.62: Added new 'Financials->Buffer Costs' property category.
Version 4.63: Reordered the position of the 'Financials' property category.
Version 4.68: Renamed 'InitializedAddOnProcess' property to 'RunInitializedAddOnProcess'.
Version 4.73: Renamed 'EventName' property to 'TriggeringEventName'. Renamed 'EventCount' property to 'TriggeringEventCount'.
Version 4.78: Renamed 'Arrival Logic' property category to 'Entity Arrival Logic'.
Version 5.87: Process logic now uses new property 'HasValue' function instead of deprecated 'IsDefined'.
Version 5.90: 'Before Creating Entities' table reference assignments are now supported by the 'Initial Number Entities' feature if using the 'On Event' arrival mode.
Version 5.91: Version update to support TransferNode object update. Added information to indicate which properties to display if the new 'Show Commonly Used Properties Only' option is enabled.
Version 6.103: Some property description updates.
Version 6.106: Required update due to TransferNode object updates.
Version 7.122: Required update due to TransferNode object updates.
Version 7.123: Required update due to TransferNode object updates.
Version 7.130: Added new 'Entity Arrival Logic -> Other Arrival Stream Options' property category.
Version 7.130: Required update due to TransferNode object updates.
Version 7.131: Required update due to TransferNode object updates.
Version 8.133: Required update due to TransferNode object updates.
Version 8.134: Required update due to TransferNode object updates.
Version 8.135: Hide the inherited 'ExpectedSetupTimeExpression' and 'ExpectedOperationTimeExpression' properties.
Version 8.137: Required update due to TransferNode object updates.
Version 8.139: Added new 'Buffer Capacities' property category.
Version 8.141: Required update due to TransferNode object updates.

Version 8.145: 'Redirect Location Type' property of OutputBuffer station specified as 'ParentExternalNode' with redirect external node name 'Output'. Created entities now first transferred into an infinite capacity 'Processing' station before transferring into the source's OutputBuffer station.
Version 8.146: Renamed 'Buffer Capacity' property category to 'Buffer Logic'. Added output buffer balking options.

Version 8.147: Renamed 'Table Reference Assignments' property category to 'Table Row Referencing'. Added ability to table row referencing options to either add a new table row (automatically setting a reference to the new row) or reference an existing row.
Version 9.149: Added Buffer Logic -> Balking & Reneging Options -> Renege Triggers.
Version 9.156: OnRunInitialized process logic - Added an Exclusion Expression for the Decide step that checks whether to create initial entities if the Arrival Mode is 'On Event'.
Version 9.158: Required update due to TransferNode object update.
Version 9.161: Required update due to TransferNode object update.
Version 9.164: Required update due to TransferNode object update.
Version 9.170: Property description updates.
Version 10.174: Required update due to TransferNode object update.
Version 10.176: Required update due to TransferNode object update.
Version 10.180: Some property description updates.
Version 11.193: Required update due to TransferNode object update.
Version 12.203: Required update due to TransferNode object update.

Category.Name: Entity Arrival Logic/Other Arrival Stream Options
Category.Description: Entity Arrival Logic/Other Arrival Stream Options

Category.Name: Table Row Referencing/Before Creating Entities
Category.Description: Table Row Reference Actions Before Creating Entities

Category.Name: Table Row Referencing/On Created Entity
Category.Description: Table Row Reference Actions On Created Entity

DynamicObjectInstanceProperty.Name: EntityType
DynamicObjectInstanceProperty.Description: The type of entities created by this Source object.

EnumProperty.Name: ArrivalMode
EnumProperty.Description: The method used by this Source object to generate a stream of entity arrivals.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TimeOffset
ExpressionProperty.Description: Expression that is evaluated once at the beginning of the simulation run. Indicates the time offset until the first arrival at this Source object.

ExpressionProperty.Name: InterarrivalTime
ExpressionProperty.Description: Expression that is evaluated whenever an arrival occurs at this Source object. Indicates the time until the next arrival. This property may be specified using a random sample from a distribution (typically the exponential distribution).

RateTableProperty.Name: RateTable
RateTableProperty.Description: The rate table that defines how the rate of entity arrival events changes over time, the interarrival times following a non-stationary poisson process.

ExpressionProperty.Name: RateScaleFactor
ExpressionProperty.Description: The factor used to scale the arrival rate values specified in the rate table.

ExpressionProperty.Name: InitialNumberEntities
ExpressionProperty.Description: An initial number of entities to be created by this Source object at the beginning of the simulation run, in addition to entities created by the 'On Event' arrival mode. Note that this initial entity creation is not included in (counted against) the arrival mode's Maximum Arrivals.

EventProperty.Name: TriggeringEventName
EventProperty.Description: The name of the event whose occurrences determine when the next entity arrival occurs at this Source object.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TriggeringEventCount
ExpressionProperty.Description: The number of triggering event occurrences required to trigger the next entity arrival at this Source object.

TableAndColumnProperty.Name: ArrivalTimeProperty
TableAndColumnProperty.Description:
The name of the numeric table property (table column) that contains the discrete times when arrival events are expected to occur.
When an arrival event occurs, a reference to the table row holding the arrival time will be automatically assigned to any individual entities created by the event.

ExpressionProperty.Name: ArrivalEventsPerTimeSlot
ExpressionProperty.Description:
The number of arrival events expected to occur at each of the discrete times defined in the Arrival Time Property. When an arrival event occurs, the actual number of entities created (i.e., the arrival 'batch size') is then determined by the Entities Per Arrival property.
To vary the number of arrival events for each time slot, add a numeric column that contains those values to the referenced arrival table. Then specify the name of that table column here.
ExpressionProperty.Category: Entity Arrival Logic/Other Arrival Stream Options

ExpressionProperty.Name: ArrivalTimeDeviation
ExpressionProperty.Description:
Expression used to model differences (typically random) between the scheduled times in the arrival table and the actual times during a simulation run that each arrival event occurs.
The specified expression may return a negative or positive value. A negative value indicates that the actual arrival time will occur earlier than the scheduled time by that duration. A positive value indicates that the actual arrival time will occur later than the scheduled time by that duration.
To vary the arrival time deviation for each time slot, add an expression column that contains those expressions to the referenced arrival table. Then specify the name of that table column here.
NOTE: This feature is automatically disabled if random sampling in the simulation run is disabled.
ExpressionProperty.Category: Entity Arrival Logic/Other Arrival Stream Options

ExpressionProperty.Name: ArrivalNoShowProbability
ExpressionProperty.Description:
The probability that a scheduled arrival in the arrival pattern will be a no-show and thus the timer's event not actually fired. Enter the chance of a no-show as a value between 0.0 (0%) and 1.0 (100%).
To vary the no-show probability for each time slot, add a numeric column that contains those probabilities to the referenced arrival table. Then specify the name of that table column here.
NOTE: This feature is automatically disabled if random sampling in the simulation run is disabled.
ExpressionProperty.Category: Entity Arrival Logic/Other Arrival Stream Options

ExpressionProperty.Name: EntitiesPerArrival
ExpressionProperty.Description: The number of entities that will be created by this Source object for each arrival event.

EnumProperty.Name: RepeatArrivalPattern
EnumProperty.Description: Indicates whether the arrival pattern in the table should be repeated when the end of the pattern is reached.

ExpressionProperty.Name: EntityArrivalsRandomNumberStream
ExpressionProperty.Description: The random number stream used to generate interarrival times (if rate table) or make probabilistic no-show decisions (if arrival table).

ExpressionProperty.Name: MaximumArrivals
ExpressionProperty.Description: A limit on the total number of arrivals to be automatically generated by this Source object during the simulation run.

ExpressionProperty.Name: MaximumTime
ExpressionProperty.Description: The maximum time from the beginning of the simulation run after which this Source object will stop generating arrivals.

EventProperty.Name: StopEventName
EventProperty.Description: The name of an event whose occurrence will trigger this Source object to stop generating arrivals for the remainder of the simulation run.

IntegerProperty.Name: OutputBufferCapacity
IntegerProperty.Description: The number of discrete entities that can be held in the buffer.

EnumProperty.Name: OutputBufferBalkDecisionType
EnumProperty.Description:
The method used by an entity to decide whether to balk at entering the buffer.
If the decision type is ‘Blocked’, then an entity attempting to enter the buffer will balk if the buffer is full rather than be blocked. Or, if a zero capacity buffer, the entity will balk if its attempt to transfer directly into or out of the object is blocked.

ExpressionProperty.Name: OutputBufferBalkConditionOrProbability
ExpressionProperty.Description: The balk condition or probability specified as an expression. If a probability then enter the chance of balking as a value between 0.0 (0%) and 1.0 (100%).

NodeProperty.Name: OutputBufferBalkNodeName
NodeProperty.Description: Facility node location to send an entity that has balked at entering the buffer.

RepeatingProperty.Name: OutputBufferRenegeTriggers
RepeatingProperty.Description: Optional time or event-driven triggers that can cause entities to abandon waiting in the buffer.

EnumProperty.Name: OutputBufferRenegeTriggerType
EnumProperty.Description:
The type of trigger.
A time based trigger can renege an entity from the buffer once a specified wait duration expires.
An event based trigger can renege an entity from the buffer whenever a specified event occurs.

ExpressionProperty.Name: OutputBufferRenegeWaitDuration
ExpressionProperty.Description: The wait duration until deciding whether to renege an entity from the buffer.

EventProperty.Name: OutputBufferRenegeTriggeringEventName
EventProperty.Description: The name of the event whose occurrence will trigger a decision whether to renege an entity from the buffer.

EnumProperty.Name: OutputBufferRenegeDecisionType
EnumProperty.Description: The method used when the trigger has fired to decide whether to renege an entity from the buffer.

ExpressionProperty.Name: OutputBufferRenegeConditionOrProbability
ExpressionProperty.Description:
The renege condition or probability specified as an expression. If a probability then enter the chance of reneging as a value between 0.0 (0%) and 1.0 (100%).
NOTE: If it is necessary to check in a conditional expression whether an entity is currently waiting for a specific type of constraint, the entity ‘Queuing’ namespace provides several functions for that purpose (e.g., Entity.Queuing.IsWaitingRidePickupQueue).

NodeProperty.Name: OutputBufferRenegeNodeName
NodeProperty.Description: Facility node location to send a reneging entity.

EnumProperty.Name: OutputBufferRenegeTriggerStartBoundary
EnumProperty.Description: Indicates when the trigger becomes active for an entity occupying the buffer. Can be either immediately when the entity has entered the buffer or, alternatively, not until its transfer into the buffer has been ended (e.g., after a transfer-in time or any other entry related logic).

RepeatingProperty.Name: AssignmentsBeforeExiting
RepeatingProperty.Description: Optional state assignments when an entity is ready to exit the object.

StateProperty.Name: AssignmentsBeforeExitingStateVariableName
StateProperty.Description: Name of the state variable that will be assigned a new value.

ExpressionProperty.Name: AssignmentsBeforeExitingNewValue
ExpressionProperty.Description: The new value to assign.

RepeatingProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnBalking
RepeatingProperty.Description: Optional state assignments when an entity is balking at entering an input or output buffer of the object.

ListProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnBalkingAssignConditionType
ListProperty.Description: Condition required to perform the assignment.

ExpressionProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnBalkingAssignCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description: The condition required to perform the assignment.

StateProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnBalkingStateVariableName
StateProperty.Description: Name of the state variable that will be assigned a new value.

ExpressionProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnBalkingNewValue
ExpressionProperty.Description: The new value to assign.

RepeatingProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnReneging
RepeatingProperty.Description: Optional state assignments when an entity is reneging from an input or output buffer of the object.

ListProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnRenegingAssignConditionType
ListProperty.Description: Condition required to perform the assignment.

ExpressionProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnRenegingAssignCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description: The condition required to perform the assignment.

StateProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnRenegingStateVariableName
StateProperty.Description: Name of the state variable that will be assigned a new value.

ExpressionProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnRenegingNewValue
ExpressionProperty.Description: The new value to assign.

EnumProperty.Name: TableRowReferenceBeforeCreatingEntitiesActionType
EnumProperty.Description:
The type of table row reference action to perform.
The ‘Reference Existing Row’ action type may be used to set a reference to an existing row in a data table or sequence table. The row index into the table is specified by the Row Number property.
The ‘Add New Row’ action type may be used to add a new row to an output table. A reference will be automatically set to the newly added row.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TableRowReferenceBeforeCreatingEntitiesRowNumber
ExpressionProperty.Description: The one-based row index into the table.

EnumProperty.Name: TableRowReferenceOnCreatedEntityActionType
EnumProperty.Description:
The type of table row reference action to perform.
The ‘Reference Existing Row’ action type may be used to set a reference to an existing row in a data table or sequence table. The row index into the table is specified by the Row Number property.
The ‘Add New Row’ action type may be used to add a new row to an output table. A reference will be automatically set to the newly added row.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TableRowReferenceOnCreatedEntityRowNumber
ExpressionProperty.Description: The one-based row index into the table.

ElementProperty.Name: RunInitializedAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the simulation run is initialized.

ElementProperty.Name: RunEndingAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the simulation run is ending.

ElementProperty.Name: CreatingEntitiesAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when this Source object is about to create an arrival of one or more entities.

ElementProperty.Name: CreatedEntityAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when an entity has been created by this Source object.

ElementProperty.Name: ExitedAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when an entity has exited this object.

ExpressionProperty.Name: CapitalCost
ExpressionProperty.Description: The initial one-time setup cost to add this object to the system.

ExpressionProperty.Name: OutputBufferCostPerUse
ExpressionProperty.Description: The cost to hold an entity in this buffer irrespective of the waiting time.

ExpressionProperty.Name: OutputBufferHoldingCostRate
ExpressionProperty.Description: The cost per unit time to hold an entity in this buffer.

Element.Name: Processing
Element.Description: The location inside the source where created entities are initially located.

Element.Name: OutputBuffer
Element.Description: The location inside the source where entities wait to exit the object after being created.

Element.Name: EntityArrivals
Element.Description: The stream of entity arrival events for this Source object.
